about.title: ABOUT ME
about.text: I'm Bassam Ramadan Shaaban,I Was graduated From Beni-Suef University, Beni-Suef. I work As A Web Developer (Front End) . I build Websites Using The Following Languages: HTML, Css, JavaScript And Frameworks Like Angular, Bootstrap, What Are You Waiting For? , Contact Me For Work . You Can Download My CV From Here , Thanks.
